forum.content:
I heard this song during the midnight yesterday.All my thoughts were missing everything about my puppy love in senior high.

What if there was someone that you tried so hard but forgetting every single piece of him/her,just forgive yourself once😂😂
After all you have to gather your spirit for tomorrow.Not for him/her, for yourself.

urls.description: Music video by Colbie Caillat performing I Never Told You. (C) 2010 Universal Republic Records, a di
urls.title: Colbie Caillat - I Never Told You

forum.title: Lonely night,who was floating on your mind?
